title: I can log into the website, but not the game.
body: So I can log into my account on the website, but I cannot log in game using the same username and password. It tells me through the launcher I have the wrong username or password. I changed my password through the launcher and still no help. Any ideas???

replies.body: You might be connected to the wrong region on the client, or trying to access a different account.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help update your info if it wasn't a region issue.
